headline: Did Equity Residential's (EQR) 2026 EPS Guidance and 2025 Results Just Shift Its Investment Narrative?
summary: In early February 2026, Equity Residential reported fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, with full-year sales rising to US$3.09 billion and net income reaching US$1.12 billion, while also issuing 2026 EPS guidance of US$1.44 to US$1.56. The combination of higher annual earnings and a more modest earnings outlook underscores how the company is balancing recent performance with its expectations for the year ahead. We’ll now examine how this new 2026 EPS guidance shapes Equity...
